DOC.brief_summary: - Whether combination three therapy - metformin sulfonylurea plus Exubera , investigational drug , control diabetes least much triple combination therapy metformin sulfonylurea plus Avandia , Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) approve drug . - Whether combination two therapy - metformin plus Exubera control diabetes least much triple combination therapy metformin sulfonylurea plus Avandia .
